trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Don’t lose your subscription — please go to your account page to renew your access to Mozilla VPN. If you’re having any issues, please contact support to get help.
trans-unit.target: Nun pèrdiri u to abbunamentu — pi favuri vai nnâ pàggina dû to cuntu pi rinuvari u to accessu a Mozilla VPN. Si stai avennu prubblemi, pi favuri cuntatta l'assistenza pi fàriti ajutari.

trans-unit.source: Your Mozilla VPN subscription will end in one week. After that, you’ll no longer be able to use Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: U to abbunamento a Mozilla VPN scadi ntra na simana. Doppu nun sarà cchiù pussìbbili usari Mozilla VPN.
U to abbunamentu scadi ntra picca
